18b20c67-d872-4d94-bd2b-5ed102c3adaf.title: Acme Corp & Project Alpha
18b20c67-d872-4d94-bd2b-5ed102c3adaf.summary: Acme Corporation partnered with Global Systems Ltd. on "Project Alpha" to develop AI healthcare solutions, announced on January 15, 2023, with a $5 million budget.
key_points: Acme Corp partnered with Global Systems Ltd.
Project Alpha aims for AI healthcare solutions.
Global Systems Ltd. is based in London, led by David Brown.
